scripts.clean-start: npm run clean && npm run start
scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run sync-assets && npm run build:app && npm run build:script
scripts.abi: mkdir -p contracts/abi && for i in contracts/*.sol; do x=$(echo $i | sed 's/.sol//' | sed 's|contracts/||'); jq .abi build/contracts/$x.json > contracts/abi/$x.json; done
scripts.devchain: ganache-cli --db node_modules/@aragon/aragen/aragon-ganache -m "explain tackle mirror kit van hammer degree position ginger unfair soup bonus" -i 15 -l 100000000
scripts.publish:devnet: npm run compile && aragon publish --apm.ipfs.rpc.protocol http --apm.ipfs.rpc.host ipfs.aragon.network --no-confirm=true --keyfile ../../.localkey.json "$(npm run deploy:devnet | tail -n 1)"
scripts.publish:rpc: npm run compile && aragon publish --no-confirm=true "$(npm run deploy:rpc | tail -n 1)"
scripts.publish:rinkeby: npm run compile && aragon publish --no-confirm=true --keyfile ~/.rinkebykey.json "$(npm run deploy:rinkeby | tail -n 1)"
